page.title: 16HOUSING AROUND WIRKSWORTH
page.content: APPROX. 60% IS OWNER OCCUPIED. APPROX. 35% IS COUNCIL OWNED APPROX. 5% IS PRIVATELY RENTED. THE LORD LIEUTENANT OF DERBYSHIRE LIVES AT ALTON MANOR, SOUTH OF WIRKSWORTH. A NEW ESTATE OF DETATCHED BUNGALOWS AND HOUSES IS BEING BUILT AT YOKECLIFFE IN WIRKSWORTH. MANY COTTAGES IN AND AROUND THE TOWN ARE OVER 100 YEARS OLD AND ALTHOUGH THEY WERE ALLOWED TO FALL INTO DISREPAIR ALMOST ALL OF THEM ARE NOW IN USE. ALL THE FARM HOUSES IN THE AREA ARE OVER 50 YEARS OLD AND ARE IN GOOD REPAIR.
